result.execSummary:
The defendant MARJORIE L. KOMANEKIN was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. MARJORIE L. KOMANEKIN

records.addlTxt: Shawano County DNA Proof of Submission - already on file

9:39 AM Defendant MARJORIE L. KOMANEKIN in court.  Attorney Elisabeth Lynn Stockbridge in court for MARJORIE L. KOMANEKIN.  Prosecuting attorney Laura Nelson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant enters N.C. plea to count 1. Court advises party of their rights, finds factual basis, accepts defendant's waiver of their rights, the plea made, and finds guilty. State and Defense make sentencing recommendation. Court orders Count 1 4 years probation with conditions.
Final pre-trial on October 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:23 AM Defendant MARJORIE L. KOMANEKIN appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Elisabeth Lynn Stockbridge appeared by video for MARJORIE L. KOMANEKIN.  Attorney Laura Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense awaiting a global offer requesting another FPT.
Final pre-trial scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
